channels.label: Control
channels.description: Player control

channels.label: Volume
channels.description: the sound volume of the device

channels.label: Mute
channels.description: Set or get the mute state of the device

channels.label: Play URI
channels.description: Plays a given URI

channels.label: App
channels.description: Name of the currently running application

channels.label: App Id
channels.description: Id of the currently running application

channels.label: Idling
channels.description: Is Chromecast active or idling

channels.label: App Status
channels.description: Status reported by the current application

channels.label: Current Time
channels.description: Current time (in seconds) of currently playing media

channels.label: Duration
channels.description: Length of currently playing media

channels.label: Media Type
channels.description: The type of the currently playing media. One of GENERIC, MOVIE, TV_SHOW, AUDIO_TRACK, PHOTO

channels.label: Album Artist
channels.description: The name of the album's artist

channels.label: Album Name
channels.description: The name of the album

channels.label: Artist
channels.description: The name of the artist

channels.label: Broadcast Date
channels.description: The broadcast date of the currently playing media

channels.label: Composer
channels.description: The composer of the current track

channels.label: Creation Date
channels.description: The creation date of the currently playing media

channels.label: Disc Number
channels.description: The disc number of the currently playing media

channels.label: Episode Number
channels.description: The episode number of the currently playing media

channels.label: Image
channels.description: The image that represents this media. Normally cover-art or scene from a movie

channels.description: The image URL that represents this media. Normally cover-art or scene from a movie

channels.label: Location Name
channels.description: The location of where the current media was taken
